caption.p: ( a) Graphical representation of operando spectroscopy under an Ar atmosphere using an Li-metal, NASICON, and nanopowder TiC as anode, conducting the electrolyte and cathode, respectively. ( b) C1s spectra of the TiC cathode before discharge (fresh cell). ( c) Percentage of components in the Ti2p spectra during the discharge process (galvanostatic mode). ( d) C1s spectra of the TiC cathode after discharge. ( e) C1s spectra of the TiC cathode after Ar + sputtering. ( f) Percentage of components in the Ti2p spectra in a scrubbed electrode. ( g– i) The discharge product layer’s effective thickness on an Ar +-sputtered TiC cathode at various discharge depths [ 70]. Copyright 2016 The American Chemical Society.
